hotmail downloader
copies all emails from a hotmail account to the hard drive this prevents messages from being completely lost in the event of an accidental account deletion
it uses python, and a module called cPAMIE the module automates the IE GUI - it logs into the account, and goes through each letter one by one, downloading the source code of the page.
